dc_title_s: Utility Lines, Edge Features: Montgomery County, Maryland, 2015
dc_description_s: This is a feature class in the geodatabase Planimetric Mapping Features, Utilities: Montgomery County, Maryland, 2018. The data set contains utility transmission lines and transformer stations as created from the planimetric mapping effort for Montgomery County. The data is attributed according to a feature coding scheme developed by the GeoMaP consortium.11/10/2015: Entire countywide data updated by KUCERA INTERNATIONAL. Source date: 4/10/2014 imagery
dc_creator_sm: Montgomery County Planning Department of the Maryland National Capital Park and Planning Commission
dc_publisher_sm: The Maryland-National Capital Park and Planning Commission
